AI Description: RagTag is a software tool designed to scaffold, polish, and evaluate assemblies by aligning them to reference genomes. It is particularly useful for improving the quality of genome assemblies and identifying misassemblies.
Core Features: Scaffolding Assemblies To A Reference Genome, Polishing Assemblies Using Reference Genomes, Detecting & Correcting Misassemblies In Genome Assemblies, Evaluating The Quality Of Genome Assemblies
General Tags: Assembly Improvement, Genome Alignment, Assembly Evaluation
